hudson.tasks.junit

Class SuiteResultTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • junit.framework.Assert
      • junit.framework.TestCase
        • hudson.tasks.junit.SuiteResultTest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    junit.framework.Test

    public class SuiteResultTest
extends junit.framework.TestCase
    Test cases for parsing JUnit report XML files. As there are no XML schema for JUnit xml files, Hudson needs to handle varied xml files.
    Author:
    Erik Ramfelt, Christoph Kutzinski
